contents.text: Welcome to Discord Support in San Francisco, your connection to crystal clear voice and text chat.
Press 1 for account and billing inquiries.
Press 1 for account setup and login assistance.
Please hold while we connect you to an account specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to reset my Discord password and log in quickly.
I can’t log into my Discord account and need to reset my password to access my veteran support server.
Help me reset my two-factor authentication and clear stale login tokens to regain account access
I forgot how to log into my Discord account and need help resetting my password.
I can’t log into my Discord account to join my physics study group server and need help with account setup.

contents.text: Press 2 for billing and subscription questions.
Please hold while we connect you to a billing specialist.

navigationGoals: I want to update my payment method for my Nitro subscription.
I want to apply a military discount to my Nitro subscription and update my billing details.
I need to migrate my Discord Nitro plan to an annual subscription and update my credit card details
I need to review my recent subscription charges and update my payment details.
I need to sort out my Nitro subscription billing, especially to apply for a student discount.

contents.text: Press 2 for technical support and troubleshooting.
Press 1 for voice chat quality and connectivity issues.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support agent.

navigationGoals: My voice calls keep dropping—please fix my connectivity.
My voice chat keeps dropping when I’m in calls with my veteran community group.
Diagnose and resolve packet loss and high latency in my Discord voice channels to improve call quality
My voice chat keeps cutting out and I need help improving the connection.
My voice chat keeps dropping during group problem-solving sessions and I need to fix the connectivity issue.

contents.text: Press 2 for mobile and desktop app support.
Please hold while we connect you to an app support specialist.

navigationGoals: My desktop app keeps crashing on launch; help me resolve it fast.
My Discord mobile app keeps crashing on startup and I need help fixing it.
Fix the Discord desktop client crash loop error after the latest update on my Windows machine
I can't get the Discord app to work on my phone and need help installing or updating it.
The Discord desktop app crashes when I open a voice channel for my study group—I need help updating or reinstalling it.
